2100170.name: No Way Out
2100170.description:
NO WAY OUT is a first person psychological horror game, featuring scary and jumpy gameplay and an unsettling and interesting narrative.

STORYLINE

There is now 2 possibilities for a Narrative, maybe more that one ending?

You were driving around and you got lost without signal and No Way of getting Out of the place where you stopped. The only solution is to keep going on foot until you find a place to get away for the rain and thunderstorm. The thing you didn't know is that the house you get into, may not allow you to get out! You start by finding a way into the house, but at the end your main goal is to find Way Out of the house also keeping in mind that you may have NO WAY OUT.

CHARACTERS

You are the main character in the story, other characters narrative is told by papers found in the map or audios/videos.

GAMEPLAY

Use everything that you can to survive this scary story and dive deeper into it.


Develop the photos that you take to find clues or discover more about the narrative.


Unlock door by searching for the key or by solving puzzels.


Use all your equipment to enjoy this terrifying experience.
2100170.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
